activities: TMRG compiles Internet usage information from millions of Internet research panel members to create research reports on Internet trends and e-commerce activities. Members explicitly consent to join our panel for the purpose of participating in market research in exchange for access to promotions offered by TMRG and its partners. During registration, members may submit their names and other personally identifiable information (PII) for the purposes of facilitating communication with TMRG or for receiving promotions. TMRG does not provide PII about our members to the recipients of our research reports or any other third parties
corpofftitle1: Chief Privacy Officer, Executive Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: TMRG, Inc. is committed to cooperating with data protection authorities located in the European Union (EU DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) or their authorized representatives.
